premise: A man standing in a narrow alley posing for a picture.
hypothesis: A man is outside.
explanation_1: A narrow alley is located outside.

premise: Two young children are playing.
hypothesis: Children are playing.
explanation_1: Young children are children.

premise: Very colorful women at a party.
hypothesis: Woman are at a party.
explanation_1: There are both women at a party.

premise: A dog is jumping through the snow over some weeds.
hypothesis: There is a dog moving outside.
explanation_1: There is a dog jumping through snow outsides over some weeds.

premise: There are three men having a conversation at a social place.
hypothesis: The men are all talking to each other
explanation_1: "talking" is a rephrasing of " having a conversation".

premise: A man and a woman laying on red metal benches in front of a city skyline on a sunny day.
hypothesis: people are outside
explanation_1: People referred to man and woman.

premise: A man puts a helmet on his head.
hypothesis: A man is wearing a helmet
explanation_1: The man put on a helmet, therefore, he is wearing a helmet

premise: A woman, dressed in pink shorts and a bikini top, is leaping.
hypothesis: There is a woman leaping.
explanation_1: The woman is leaping regardless of what she's wearing.

premise: A man wearing sunglasses is sitting in a small vehicle.
hypothesis: man in vehicle
explanation_1: I think sentence 1 is in sentence 2's place here.

premise: Two young women posing for the camera.
hypothesis: The two women were showing their friends where they were at
explanation_1: Women do not have to be young.  Just because two young women posing for the camera it does not mean they were showing friends where they were at.

premise: Three boys are running on the beach playing a game.
hypothesis: The children are running away from a dog.
explanation_1: The fact boys are running on the beach does not necessarily mean they are running away from a dog.

premise: Child hanging decorations on a wooden fence.
hypothesis: The child is decoration his house.
explanation_1: Child hanging decorations on a wooden fence doesn't imply he is decorating his house

premise: A man is breakdancing in front of a crowd of people.
hypothesis: The man is a street performer.
explanation_1: He could just be having fun instead of being a street performer.

premise: A woman in a white v-neck shirt is enjoying a meal outside.
hypothesis: A woman is having a picnic.
explanation_1: Not all meals outside are considered having a picnic.

premise: A person wearing skis is also paragliding with a red parachute.
hypothesis: A person is paragliding over water.
explanation_1: paragliding doesn't always mean over water.

premise: A group of men wearing suits standing with other people sitting, standing, and riding a bike.
hypothesis: There are a group of men wearing suits for the event.
explanation_1: Wearing suits does not imply it is for any event.

premise: A young girl on an orange slide
hypothesis: A young boy playing.
explanation_1: A young girl on a orange slide doesn't mean that she's playing with the boy.

premise: A man is standing on top of a tall building that overlooks the city.
hypothesis: The man is in the middle of nowhere.
explanation_1: one man is in the city while the other man is in the middle of nowhere

premise: Three women are inside a bar are all holding drinks in their hands.
hypothesis: there is a group of people outside at a restaurant eating dinner and waving their napkins in the air
explanation_1: A bar and a restaurant are different places. Holding drinks and waving napkins are separate activities.

premise: A white dog jumping after a flying yellow ball.
hypothesis: The white dog is walking towards a ball on the field.
explanation_1: jumping and walking are not the same.

premise: A young women, that looks like a prostitute, is sitting on a bicycle.
hypothesis: The young woman is dancing in the street.
explanation_1: The woman cannot be sitting and dancing at the same time.

premise: A middle-aged man with long, curly red-hair wearing a dark vest, shirt and pants is holding a microphone in front of a black backdrop.
hypothesis: A man is dressed as the advertising character Mr. Clean.
explanation_1: A MR CLEAN AD IS NOT A BLACK BACKDROP

premise: Several men in hard hats walking along a snowy overlook.
hypothesis: The men are on a beach.
explanation_1: The man can be either walking on a snowy overlook or are at a beach.

premise: A man wearing a red, yellow, and green hat is bent over a saw.
hypothesis: A woman is eating dinner
explanation_1: Man is not woman
